**We** <FONT COLOR="#FF0000">**Love**</font> <FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Servers**</font>
**Where Quality Meets Affordability!**
<FONT COLOR="#FF0000">European VPS Expansion!</font>
 
WeLoveServers is proud to announce that as part of our constant mission to be a global company serving clients worldwide, we have expanded to yet another location expansion for a location site that was heavily requested among our customers in Europe: **Frankfurt, Germany**! Now hosting hundreds of VPS customers, we offer quality VPS hosting services out of 4 global locations!

This new Germany location is out of Frankfurt in the Global Switch datacenter, providing unparalleled uptime with the carrier neutral datacenter. This expansion is another huge accomplishment for us and we thank our customers for making this possible.
 
_________________________________________________________________

We Love Servers offers 4 hosting locations for the above promotions. You may select the location you would like your VPS to be set up in during the ordering process.

- Frankfurt, Germany **(New!)** - 62.113.202.2
- Los Angeles, California - 192.210.195.2
